title: Custom License URL Overrides for Non-Meta Models
description: Provides official license URL mappings for non-Meta models that use known license types (like Llama licenses from Nous Research models)
problem: Non-Meta models with Llama licenses (e.g., Nous: Hermes 3 405B) get HuggingFace README/LICENSE URLs instead of official Llama license URLs. Meta-branded models ('Meta: Llama 3.1...') are handled correctly by Stage D, but non-Meta Llama models ('Nous: Hermes 3...') go through Stage J which only fetches HF URLs.
solution: Stage J checks this config before fetching HuggingFace URLs. If a model's license_name matches an entry here, the official URL is used instead of the HF URL. This ensures non-Meta Llama models get the same official license URLs as Meta models.
usage: Used by Stage J (J_custom_license_urls.py) to override HuggingFace-based license URLs with official license URLs for known license types
notes: Extensible for other license types (QWEN, Kimi, NVIDIA, Tencent) in future
Only applies to custom models processed by Stage J
Meta-branded Llama models already handled correctly by Stage D
